enhanced_by.reason: Setting the old parameter is necessary to compare it with the new parameter in isCoreChanged.
Setting the new parameter is necessary to compare it with the old parameter in isCoreChanged.
Setting the changeRequired flag is necessary to determine if the parameter's required status has changed.
Setting the changeAllowEmptyValue flag is necessary to determine if the parameter's allowEmptyValue status has changed.
Setting the changeExplode flag is necessary to determine if the parameter's explode status has changed.
Setting the changeStyle flag is necessary to determine if the parameter's style has changed.
Both isCoreChanged and isChanged methods determine the compatibility of changes, making isChanged a good candidate for asserting the results of isCoreChanged.
The getChangedElements method provides a list of changed elements, which can be used to assert the changes detected by isCoreChanged.
